entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or thunderstorms. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:52 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
